OneWithDeath.PsychicRitualDef_ForbiddenK.label: Forbidden Knowledge
OneWithDeath.PsychicRitualDef_ForbiddenK.description: Something is linked to the altar, I can feel it, by focusing on it with the help of a sacrifice, we can try and skip the source of this power. Who knows what will arrive, we should be careful.
OneWithDeath.PsychicRitualDef_ForbiddenK.outcomeDescription: The key to necromancy is behind this ritual; A book will appear on completion, along with something else that defends this knowledge. We should prepare ourselves.
